organization.description: Group for Economics data especially that which is [open data](http://opendefinition.org/). This can be any kind of data related to economics from development to finance, and micro to macro. We run an open group policy so anyone can add datasets to this group but we will review datasets added to the group for quality.
organization.title: Economics Datasets
organization.name: economics

name: exchange-rates
notes:
Consolidated historical exchange rate data from a variety of sources.

### Data

Consolidated data is in a single table with all currencies given against the US dollar (USD).

    | Date | Rate | Currency | Frequency |

Dates are given in ISO 8601 format. For all frequencies above a day the date is the day at the start of that period.

Currencies are listed by their [ISO 4127 Currency code](dataset:iso-4127-currency-codes).

Frequency:

     A = Annual
     SA = Semiannual
     Q = Quarterly
     M = Monthly
     BW = Bi-Weekly
     W = Weekly
     D = Daily


Sources (see resources):

* [Foreign Exchange Rate Data from Federal Reserve (H.10 release)][h10] available in FRED database (package:econ-fred), specifically http://research.stlouisfed.org/fred2/categories/15
* [Foreign exchange rates against the euro from ECB][ecb]
* [OECD monthly exchange rates against USD][oecd]

[ecb]: http://www.ecb.int/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/index.en.html
[h10]: http://www.federalreserve.gov/releases/h10/hist/
[oecd]: http://stats.oecd.org/Index.aspx?DataSetCode=MEI_FIN

### Openness: ??

Openness unclear as licensing of source data is unclear.
title: Exchange Rates
